products.name: Casio 61-Key Keyboard With Stand (LK175ST)
products.shortDescription: Experience the joy of creating your own beautiful music with the Casio LK-175. This 61-key keyboard with stand helps you learn and gain experience so you can eventually play on your own.  It offers lighted keys, a Step Up Lesson system and Sound EFX Sampler with built-in microphone for recording and blending sounds into the rhythm.

products.name: Casio 61-Key Electric Keyboard (CTK-2400)
products.shortDescription: Take centre stage with the Casio CTK-2400 Keyboard. A wide range of built-in tones and rhythms help add depth and layering to your sound, while its sampling function uses the integrated microphone to record samples that you can incorporate into your music.

products.name: Gibson SG Series '50s Tribute Electric Guitar (SGTR5C5CH1) - Heritage Cherry
products.shortDescription: Gibson's SG '50s Tribute represents the look, feel, and tone of the set-neck, double-cutaway solid body as it would have appeared in the 1950s. It carries a pair of screaming P-90 pickups, the fat Gibson single-coil that has been beloved for more than six decades, and the comfortably rounded neck profile characteristic of that decade.

products.name: Casio 88 Key Digital Piano (CDP-130CS)
products.shortDescription: Get grand piano sound from a compact digital player. This Casio digital piano boasts an 88-key scaled hammer action keyboard with three levels of touch response so you can play more expressively, with a wider range of dynamics. From rock to pop to bassa nova, this keyboard provides the space and flexibility you need to master any genre of music.

products.name: Gibson Les Paul '50s Tribute Electric Guitar (LPTR5W5CH1) - Wine Red
products.shortDescription: Gibson's Les Paul '50s Tribute honours the look, feel, and tone of the set-neck, single-cutaway solid body as it would have appeared in the 1950s. It carries a pair of screaming P-90 pickups, the fat Gibson single-coil that has been beloved for more than six decades, and the comfortably rounded neck profile characteristic of that decade.

products.name: Gibson Les Paul '50s Tribute Electric Guitar (LPTR5G5CH1) - Gold
products.shortDescription: Gibson's Les Paul '50s Tribute honours the look, feel, and tone of the set-neck, single-cutaway solid body as it would have appeared in the 1950s. It carries a pair of screaming P-90 pickups, the fat Gibson single-coil that has been beloved for more than six decades, and the comfortably rounded neck profile characteristic of that decade.

products.name: Fender Modern Player Mustang Electric Guitar - Honey Burst
products.shortDescription: Tame the wild horse of rock and roll with the Modern Player Mustang guitar from Fender. Featuring the 24 inch scale, you'll have the brightest and clearest notes that will resonate through stampedes. Inspired by the vintage, but revitalized with the ideals of the modern, produce the sound that will pull the audience along for the ride.

products.name: Gibson Les Paul 50s Tribute Electric Guitar (LPTR5E5CH1) - Ebony
products.shortDescription: Gibson's Les Paul '50s Tribute honours the look, feel, and tone of the set-neck, single-cutaway solid body as it would have appeared in the 1950s. It carries a pair of screaming P-90 pickups, the fat Gibson single-coil that has been beloved for more than six decades, and the comfortably rounded neck profile characteristic of that decade.

products.name: Singing Machine iOS Karaoke (iSM990BT) - Black
products.shortDescription: Access a seriously packed karaoke song library courtesy of Singing Machine. This unit streams music from an array of devices or from an app-based archive of over 8,000 selections to drive your most comprehensive lyrical adventure yet. Place your iPhone or iPad on the rotating cradle and belt out the best of your song collection.

products.name: Singing Machine Classic Karaoke Machine (SML388BK) - Black
products.shortDescription: What better way to jazz up a party than a sing-along session of everyone's fave tunes. The Singing Machine Classic SML388BK offers cool karaoke features like disco lights synchronized with the music to spice up your performance. It plays from your iPod or MP3 player and comes with two mike jacks for sharing the spotlight in a touching duet.

products.name: Casio 61-Key Keyboard (CTK1100BB)
products.shortDescription: The CTK1100 is perfect for beginner pianists or those wanting to brush up on their skills. The on-board tutor lets you pick right or left hand at the touch of a button to focus on one hand at a time. It includes a bank of 100 songs to play along with. The LCD screen shows which song you're playing, a fingering guide, and more.

products.name: Casio 88-Key Digital Cabinet Piano (AP450BN)
products.shortDescription: The Casio AP-450BN digital cabinet piano offers a natural playing feel and rich, resonating tones that mimic the expressive power of an acoustic piano. It features great connectivity for live performances or recordings that'll satisfy the most demanding player.

products.name: Fender Acoustic Guitar Pack (FA-100) - Natural
products.shortDescription: The FA-100 Fender Acoustic Pack has everything you need to become a rock god. The dreadnought acoustic guitar is made from beautiful mahogany and spruce and features X bracing for full, rich sound. It's easy to make sweet music with the sleek 20-fret rosewood fingerboard. Take your guitar from gig to gig using the padded bag and complete your look with the included guitar strap. Rock on!

products.name: Gibson SG '50s Tribute Electric Guitar (SGTR5V5CH1) - Vintage Sunburst
products.shortDescription: Gibson's SG '50s Tribute represents the look, feel, and tone of the set-neck, double-cutaway solid body as it would have appeared in the 1950s. It carries a pair of screaming P-90 pickups, the fat Gibson single-coil that has been beloved for more than six decades, and the comfortably rounded neck profile characteristic of that decade.

products.name: Casio 76-Key Electric Keyboard (WK-6600) - Black
products.shortDescription: Tickle the ivories in a modern way with the Casio WK-6600 high-grade keyboard. It lets you do everything from sound and rhythm editing, play with studio-quality effects and hundreds of realistic instrument and synthesizer tones, all in a compact and modern design.

products.name: Gibson SG Series '50s Tribute Electric Guitar (SGTR5E5CH1) - Ebony
products.shortDescription: Gibson's SG '50s Tribute represents the look, feel, and tone of the set-neck, double-cutaway solid body as it would have appeared in the 1950s. It carries a pair of screaming P-90 pickups, the fat Gibson single-coil that has been beloved for more than six decades, and the comfortably rounded neck profile characteristic of that decade.

products.name: ION Block Rocker Bluetooth Portable Speaker (IPA56D) - Black
products.shortDescription: Blast your favourite tunes and get the party going with the Block Rocker. This portable speaker allows you to stream music wirelessly from any Bluetooth-enabled media player, including iOS and Android devices. You can also play MP3s, microphones and instruments, making it the ideal stereo system for parties, BBQs or drive-in movies.

products.name: Casio 61-Key Electric Keyboard (CTK-3200) - Black
products.shortDescription: The Casio CTK-3200 electric keyboard is loaded with features that will bring out your inner Mozart and have you creating beautiful music whether you're a newbie or pro. It's home to 61 piano-style keys with an LCD screen, a 48 note polyphony, hundreds of tones and rhythms, and the Step-Up Lesson System that will make learning to play a breeze. You'll be composing symphonies in no time.

products.name: Fender Pawn Shop Offset Special Stratocaster Guitar - 2-Colour Sunburst
products.shortDescription: Nobody understands musicians better than Fender, and they have included artists who have the touch of the eccentric with their Pawn Shop series guitars. It utilizes the conservatism of the past with the vintage floating tremolo tailpiece but wrapped in a futuristic and enigmatic body, it has a sound that calls to the best of the past and future.

products.name: Blue Michrophones Yeti USB Microphone
products.shortDescription: Create studio-quality recordings and send them directly to your computer with the Yeti USB microphone from Blue Microphones. Four different pattern settings allow you to record vocals, instrumental music, podcasts, interviews between two people, and more. The microphone is easy to set up and features simple controls.

products.name: Yamaha Piaggero Portable Keyboard (NP-V60)
products.shortDescription: Slim and compact, the Yamaha NP-V60 Piaggero is designed to go with you everywhere and jam. It's also built to feel like playing a real piano with its graded soft-touch keys making it perfect for beginners.

products.name: Behringer Microphono Ultra-Compact Phono Preamp (PP400)
products.shortDescription: The Behringer PP400 phono preamplifier is ideal for home theatre systems that lack an input for a turntable. It features an RCA input and output and a balanced  " TRS phone output. Thanks to a balanced output, it also enables a turntable to be connected to devices such as professional mixers, recorders, and amplifiers.

products.name: Ion Karaoke Pro Portable Sound System
products.shortDescription: Turn your iPad, iPhone or Android device into a portable karaoke machine with Ion Karaoke Pro. This complete system includes a powerful speaker, amplifier, audio inputs, and an iPad cradle. Download the free karaoke app, grab the included wireless microphone, and show off your singing voice with this easy-to-use system.

products.name: Blue Microphones Yeti USB Microphone
products.shortDescription: The Yeti is a USB microphone for professional recording. THX certified, it sends incredible audio directly to your computer with a high-quality analog-to-digital converter and boasts incredibly low distortion, high fidelity, and a balanced frequency response. It provides four different pattern modes for versatile recording, so can capture something ultra-quiet or deafeningly loud.

products.name: Singing Machine Karaoke Machine (STVG-359)
products.shortDescription: Turn every night into a karaoke party with the Singing Machine STVG-359 karaoke machine. Two microphone jacks let you and a friend belt out duets, while the colour LCD screen clearly displays scrolling lyrics that you can sing along to.

products.name: Casio 61-Key High-Grade Keyboard - Black (CTK-6200K3)
products.shortDescription: The Casio CTK-6200 high-grade keyboard is packed with features that'll have you creating your own musical masterpieces. The piano-style keyboard responds to pressure for a piano-like experience, while an array of of built-in tones and rhythms make it easy to add accompaniments to your music.

products.name: Fender Vintage Hot Rod '60s Telecaster Guitar - Olympic White
products.shortDescription: Have the purest of sound and best of style with the Vintage Hot Rod '60s Telecaster from Fender. The authentic vintage style has the look, but the modern modifications bring you the best sounds of today. Pick up this guitar today, and feel rock star appeal.

products.name: Casio 88-Key Digital Piano (PX-150CS) - Black
products.shortDescription: The Casio PX-150CS 88-key digital piano offers a grand piano experience thanks to its keyboard action and powerful sound engine. It also features a lightweight design and a host of advanced functions that make it ideal for practicing, performing, or jamming.

products.name: Epiphone DR-100 Acoustic Guitar (EA10NACH1) - Natural
products.shortDescription: The Epiphone DR-100 is the company's most popular acoustic guitar for good reason. Based on a classic Gibson design dating back over 70 years, the DR-100 delivers both punch and mellow tones depending on your mood. It features mahogany back and sides, with a Select Spruce Top.

products.name: Behringer U-Phono USB/Audio Interface with Preamp (UFO202)
products.shortDescription: The Behringer U-CONTROL UFO202 allows you to digitize vinyl records and tapes. The USB and audio interface connects your turntable, cassette player and more with your computer for recording and playback, while analog RCA phono inputs and outputs connect to active speakers or studio monitors.

products.name: Yamaha 61-Key Portable Keyboard (PSRE243)
products.shortDescription: Get to tickling those ivories with this Yamaha portable keyboard. Perfect for aspiring musicians, it features exclusive Ultra Wide stereo technology for enhanced sound, and the Yamaha Education Suite, which offers lessons that can be adjusted to accommodate your performance level.

products.name: KRK ROKIT 5 G3 Monitor Speaker (RP5-G3)
products.shortDescription: The KRK ROKIT 5 G3 powered studio monitors delivers the professional features and accuracy you need for expert recording, mixing, mastering and playback. The system is equipped with a 1" soft dome tweeter and 5" glass-Aramid composite woofer for high frequencies up to 35kHz, pure vocal clarity, and extended bass response.
